## WebOIDCContainer.startAuthorization() method

Start authorization by opening authorize page

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
startAuthorization(options: AuthorizeOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>AuthorizeOptions</code> | authorize options |

<b>Returns:</b>
